result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if for every Îµ > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff_ext [CommRing R] (f : R â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
    Tendsto f atTop (ğ“ â†‘L) â†” âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : R, M < Complex.abs z â†’ dist (f z) L < Îµ := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{zâ†’âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere if and only if
for every Îµ > 0 there exists an M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_atTop_complex_iff_metric (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
  Tendsto f atTop (ğ“ L) â†” âˆ€ Îµ : â„, Îµ > 0 â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < Complex.abs z â†’ Complex.abs (f z - L) < Îµ := by sorry
